markdownRemark.excerpt: Mix and match these tips to get the most out of your event. Use your best judgement in chosing the ones that most apply. Sometimes all of them make sense…
markdownRemark.html: Mix and match these tips to get the most out of your event. Use your best judgement in chosing the ones that most apply. Sometimes all of them make sense; sometimes only a few. In any case, it’s good to have some strategies in your back pocket to make you feel confident you’re pulling off a successful event and making your volunteers happy!
